value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Secure a Windows Virtual Desktop deployment
value.excerpt: Introduction to Microsoft security capabilities that can keep your applications and data secure in your Windows Virtual Desktop deployment.

Together they explore how to debug a live microservices application using the service mesh,

value.title: Azure Security Center – Just-in-Time Network Access
value.excerpt: Cloud hosted VM’s are prime targets for RDP and SSH brute force attacks because management ports are typically left in an open state. value.title: How to add Azure Alerts as push notifications on your phone | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure mobile app allows you to receive Azure Alerts as push notifications on your mobile device.
